title: Dynamic Mission Re-tasking
description: A fighter jet on a routine patrol is dynamically re-tasked to strike a newly discovered, time-sensitive target.

tasks.description: Receive the new time-sensitive target information and verify its location and priority.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator correctly processes the new target information.

tasks.description: Check the patrol aircraft's current fuel and weapons status to confirm it can execute the new task.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator confirms the aircraft has sufficient resources for the new mission.

tasks.description: Generate and transmit a new mission plan to the pilot, including the new target, route, and ROE.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator successfully re-tasks the pilot with a valid and complete mission update.
